description: You see a bright, colorful balloon for the first time.
consequence: You are mesmerized and try to reach for it.

description: You play with a set of colorful building blocks.
consequence: You have fun stacking and knocking them over.

description: Someone blows bubbles in front of you.
consequence: You watch in amazement and try to catch them.

description: You hear some music playing nearby.
consequence: You start to sway and clap your hands to the rhythm.

description: Someone plays peekaboo with you.
consequence: You laugh and giggle every time they reappear.

description: You explore a new set of toys.
consequence: You enjoy touching and examining each one.

description: You see a playful puppy running around.
consequence: You are fascinated and watch its every move.

description: You try some new solid foods.
consequence: You make funny faces as you taste different flavors.

description: You see yourself in a mirror.
consequence: You are curious and touch the mirror, trying to understand it.

description: You touch various objects with different textures.
consequence: You explore how each texture feels with your hands.

description: You roll a soft ball across the floor.
consequence: You crawl after it and try to catch it.

description: You shake a toy rattle and listen to the sound it makes.
consequence: You smile and shake it again, enjoying the noise.

description: You play with a plastic spoon.
consequence: You examine it closely and chew on it.

description: You feel the softness of a cozy blanket.
consequence: You snuggle into it and feel comforted.

description: You watch a mobile hanging above your crib.
consequence: You are captivated by the moving shapes and colors.

description: You splash around in a shallow basin of water.
consequence: You enjoy the cool sensation and the splashing sounds.

description: You sit on the grass for the first time.
consequence: You are intrigued by the texture and try to grab it.

description: You listen to a short, simple story.
consequence: You are soothed by the sound of the voice reading to you.

description: You see birds flying and chirping outside.
consequence: You watch them intently and try to imitate their sounds.

description: You cuddle and play with a soft stuffed animal.
consequence: You feel comforted and enjoy the softness.

description: You crawl around exploring the space around you.
consequence: You discover new things and develop your motor skills.

description: You touch sand for the first time.
consequence: You are curious about the texture and try to grab handfuls.

description: You notice shadows moving on the wall.
consequence: You are intrigued and try to catch them.

description: You watch a spinning top twirl around.
consequence: You are fascinated by the motion and try to touch it.

description: You feel a gentle breeze on your face.
consequence: You smile and enjoy the cool sensation.

description: You look at pictures in a baby book.
consequence: You are curious about the images and try to touch them.

description: You play with a set of plastic toy keys.
consequence: You enjoy the jingling sound and the different shapes.

description: You listen to recordings of nature sounds.
consequence: You are calmed by the soothing noises.

description: You look at a toy with bright, vivid colors.
consequence: You are attracted to the colors and try to grab the toy.

description: You have a baby-safe mirror to play with.
consequence: You are entertained by your own reflection and make funny faces.
